title: League servers are taking a shit again riot (NA)
body: Halp op.gg says our game is won but got dcd at the end now it keeps telling me its failing to recconect back to the game lul

replies.body: If your match ended then you may be experiencing a ghost game.  When your match ends, it needs to communicate to our servers that it's ended, but a delay may be preventing that.  Usually relogging or waiting it out will resolve it on its own.  Hang tight!
tank you Porkles for fast response :^)
Restarted client now my client is back to normal but what was with the dc at the end, it wasnt on my side so it mustve been riot anyone else experience anything?
